# Xenophobic (Drawback)
## Overview
**Xenophobic:** You have a hard time understanding and trusting those with unfamiliar ways and appearances. You take a â€”2 penalty on [[Diplomacy (Skill)|Diplomacy]] and [[Sense Motive (Skill)|Sense Motive]] checks made against creatures of a different race or from a different culture.

**Source:** Ultimate Campaign, pg. 65
